title: Looking for casual playing mates
body: Not keen on anything too serious but to kick back with a few people and play some league and have a good time. IGN = SwizZz I can play adc jung and mid fairly well. I am silv 3.

replies.body: I'd be happy to play with you. My duo buddy mains jungle and I main mid/supp. I'm not the best though because I stopped playing for about 2 weeks and then I just went straight into URF so I am a bit rusty when it comes to norms but I am still up for it

Hey man, love the attitude, too many negative people in the game atm. I have a team of 4 and we're looking for a 5th person for either jung or adc so if you're keen for a game this Friday let me know. Some of us are in our prelim games and then 2 of the guys are silver 4 or 5.
My summoner name is FischSandwich, add me if you're keen, we're a bunch of funny/chilled guys but are very focused and effective when we play as a team.
Props to this. Where are all the chilled lads to play League with? I'm not 30 yet, but I'm down for Normals whenever mate. Added.
